page.title: Confidence interval
page.expressions:
<math>\hat \mu=\bar X = \frac{1}{n}\sum_{i=1}^n X_i.</math><math>\bar x=\frac {1}{25} \sum_{i=1}^{25} x_i = 250.2\,\text{grams}.</math><math>Z = \frac {\bar X-\mu}{\sigma/\sqrt{n}} =\frac {\bar X-\mu}{0.5} </math><math>P(-z\le Z\le z) = 1-\alpha = 0.95. \, </math><math>
\begin{align}
\Phi(z) & = P(Z \le z) = 1 - \tfrac{\alpha}2 = 0.975,\\[6pt]
z & = \Phi^{-1}(\Phi(z)) = \Phi^{-1}(0.975) = 1.96,
\end{align}
</math><math>
\begin{align}
0.95 & = 1-\alpha=P(-z \le Z \le z)=P \left(-1.96 \le \frac {\bar X-\mu}{\sigma/\sqrt{n}} \le 1.96 \right) \\[6pt]
& = P \left( \bar X - 1.96 \frac{\sigma}{\sqrt{n}} \le \mu \le \bar X + 1.96 \frac{\sigma}{\sqrt{n}}\right) \\[6pt]
& = P\left(\bar X - 1.96 \times 0.5 \le \mu \le \bar X + 1.96 \times 0.5\right) \\[6pt]
& = P \left( \bar X - 0.98 \le \mu \le \bar X + 0.98 \right).
\end{align}
</math><math> \bar X - 0{.}98 \, </math><math> \bar X + 0.98. \, </math><math>(\bar x - 0.98;\bar x + 0.98) = (250.2 - 0.98; 250.2 + 0.98) = (249.22; 251.18).\,</math>

\right] </math><math>\Gamma\left(\frac{1}{2}-n\right) = {(-4)^n n! \over (2n)!} \sqrt{\pi} = \frac{(-2)^n}{(2n-1)!!}\, \sqrt{\pi} = \sqrt{\pi} / \left[ {-\frac{1}{2} \choose n} n! \right] </math><math>\Gamma'(z)=\Gamma(z)\psi_0(z)\,.</math><math>\Gamma'(m+1) = m!\cdot\left( - \gamma + \sum_{k=1}^m\frac{1}{k} \right)\,.</math><math>\frac{{\rm d}^n}{{\rm d}x^n}\,\Gamma(x) = \int_0^\infty t^{x-1} e^{-t} (\ln t)^{n} \,{\rm d}t.</math><math> \begin{array}{lll} \Gamma(-3/2) &= \tfrac{4}{3} \sqrt{\pi} &\approx 2.363271801207 \\ \Gamma(-1/2) &= -2\sqrt{\pi} &\approx -3.544907701811 \\ \Gamma(1/2) &= \sqrt{\pi} &\approx 1.772453850905 \\ \Gamma(1) &= 0! &= 1 \\ \Gamma(3/2) &= \tfrac{1}{2}\sqrt{\pi} &\approx 0.88622692545 \\ \Gamma(2) &= 1! &= 1 \\ \Gamma(5/2) &= \tfrac{3}{4}\sqrt{\pi} &\approx 1.32934038818 \\ \Gamma(3) &= 2! &= 2 \\ \Gamma(7/2) &= \tfrac{15}{8}\sqrt{\pi} &\approx 3.32335097045\\ \Gamma(4) &= 3! &= 6 \\ \end{array} </math><math>\Pi(z) = \Gamma(z+1) = z \; \Gamma(z) = \int_0^\infty e^{-t} t^{z+1}\,\frac{{\rm d}t}{t},</math><math>\Pi(n) = n!\,,</math><math>\Gamma\left(\frac{s}{2}\right)\zeta(s)\pi^{-s/2} = \Gamma\left(\frac{1-s}{2}\right)\zeta(1-s)\pi^{-(1-s)/2}.</math><math>\zeta(z) \; \Gamma(z) = \int_0^\infty \frac{t^{z}}{e^t-1} \; \frac{dt}{t}.</math>
